attributes.action: relax the regulations re Guaranteed Minimum Pensions (GMP), provided as SERPS replacement, so that they can be paid before the  State Pension Age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to THE OCCUPATIONAL PENSION SCHEMES (CONTRACTING-OUT)(AMENDMENT) REGULATIONS 2009, from 6th April 2009 occupational pension schemes will have the ability to convert GMPs into an equivalent scheme pension. But, it is a widely held belief that because many schemes have yet to equalise GMPs for men and women, few schemes will avail themselves of the new legislation.
